summary: The script sets up and runs a streamlined disease simulation that focuses exclusively on measles-related mortality, extracts the resulting death counts, and compares them against external Global Burden of Disease (GBD) estimates, producing visual output to illustrate any discrepancies.
business_intent: To validate and benchmark the measles mortality component of the health simulation model against established GBD data, supporting evidenceâ€‘based decision making and model refinement for public health planning.
